description: Try our easy to follow Rainbow Choc Chip Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rainbow Choc Chip Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roll level tablespoons of mixture into balls; place 4cm apart on prepared trays; gently press down on cookies to flatten slightly. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Set aside on trays for 5 minutes; transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Once cool, drizzle over DR. OETKER Designer Icing White.
